com.stockticker.logic

Interface AuthorizationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserAuthorization

    public interface AuthorizationService
    This is the interface defines the functionality for user authorization. It provides methods to register, unregister, log in, log out, unregister, change password, etc.
    Author:
    Michael Grissom

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      This method changes the password for a user.
      UserInfo getUserInfo(String username)
      This method gets the user's information.
      boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
      This method returns whether a specific user is logged in to the system
      boolean isRegistered(String username)
      This method checks if the user is registered.
      boolean logIn(String username, String password)
      This method logs in a specific user to the system.
      boolean logOut(String username)
      This method logs out a specific user from the system.
      boolean register(String username, String password, UserInfo userInfo)
      This method registers a specific user to the system.
      boolean unRegister(String username)
      This method un-registers a user from the system.
      boolean updateUserInfo(String username, UserInfo userInfo)
      This method updates the user's information.

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        boolean logIn(String username,
            String password)
              throws BusinessLogicException
        This method logs in a specific user to the system.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Returns:
        true if user was logged in
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        Returns:
        true if user was logged out
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
                   throws BusinessLogicException
        This method returns whether a specific user is logged in to the system
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        Returns:
        true if user is currently logged in
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • register

        boolean register(String username,
               String password,
               UserInfo userInfo)
                 throws BusinessLogicException
        This method registers a specific user to the system.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        userInfo - a UserInfo object containing name
        Returns:
        true if user was registered
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • unRegister

        This method un-registers a user from the system.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user was unregistered
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • updateUserInfo

        boolean updateUserInfo(String username,
                     UserInfo userInfo)
                       throws BusinessLogicException
        This method updates the user's information.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        userInfo - a UserInfo object with the user's information
        Returns:
        true if the user's information was changed
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • changePassword

        boolean changePassword(String username,
                     String oldPassword,
                     String newPassword)
                       throws BusinessLogicException
        This method changes the password for a user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        oldPassword - the user's old password
        newPassword - the user's new password
        Returns:
        true if the password was changed
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException
